events.message: I want to request a refund for the jacket I bought last week because it does not fit me at all.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund due to their refund and return inquiry.
The support ticket has been assigned to agent Maria T. for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want a refund for your jacket. I am here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket has not been worn and it's still with all tags and original packaging intact.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once we receive the jacket returned. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response! I will ship the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
The return label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
We noticed your return has been delivered. Please let us know if you have received your refund or need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the full refund yesterday. Thanks for the excellent support throughout the process!
Glad to hear the refund was completed successfully. Closing the case now. Have a great day!
